pluginstrument.author: SIMSTRUMENTATION & Russ Barlow
pluginstrument.description:
************************ CIRRUS SF50 VISION JET MS START CONTROL ***************************** ****************************************************************************************** Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION in collaboration with Russ Barlow for FlightFX VisionJet, updated for MS 2024 VisionJet by Vandalay1125 GitHub: https://simstrumentation.com
Start control for the Vision Jet by MS/Asobo
Version info: - **v1.0** - 2025-1-2 - Updated for MS verrsion of SF50 in FS2024
NOTES: - Will only work with the MS Vision Jet
KNOWN ISSUES: - None
ATTRIBUTION: -Based on code from Russ Barlow. Used with permission. -Sharing or re-use of any code or assets is not permitted without credit to the original authors.
